sentences.english: Palace guards' changing a rites is to be subjected to what visitor likes very much.

sentences.english: He has been Colonel of the Welsh Guards since 1975.
sentences.chinese: 查爾斯於1975年開始擔任威爾士禁衛軍陸軍上校。

sentences.english: The power of emperor's guard troopswastheorganic constitute of Chinese ancient regality.

sentences.english: The platinum has Royal palace guards to stand guard before the temple.
sentences.chinese: 白金漢宮前有皇家禁衛軍站崗。

sentences.english: What early firearms were commonly used by the Janissaries?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，土耳其蘇丹禁衛軍早期通常都用什麼武器？

sentences.english: The main role of the Tabardariyya is to guard the Sultan and the palace.
sentences.chinese: 蘇丹禁衛軍主要職責爲保護蘇丹王室及蘇丹宮殿。

sentences.english: As praetorian prefect he is said to have had good judgement whenever he sought to act.
sentences.chinese: 身爲禁衛軍長官他在行動時有着良好的判斷力。
